TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Pkcs8PrivateKeyInfo extends System.Object

summary.span: 允许检查和创建 PKCS#8 PrivateKeyInfo 和 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo 值。

span.span: Enables the inspection of and creation of PKCS#8 PrivateKeyInfo and EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo values.
This class cannot be inherited.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不对`privateKey`参数执行验证; 并非所有算法都需要 BER 编码的值。No validation is done on the `privateKey` parameter; not all algorithms require a BER-encoded value. 此构造函数的默认行为是创建`algorithmParameters` `privateKey`和参数的防御性副本。The default behavior of this constructor is to make a defensive copy of both the `algorithmParameters` and the `privateKey` parameters. 当参数为`true`时, 将跳过此防御副本。 `skipCopies`When the `skipCopies` parameter is `true`, this defensive copy is skipped. 如果跳过了防御复制, 并`algorithmParameters`在返回值或其方法或属性所生成的任何对象的生存期内更改了或`privateKey` , 则这些对象的方法和属性可能产生意义结果或引发异常, 因为状态已损坏。If the defensive copy is skipped and the contents of either `algorithmParameters` or `privateKey` change during the lifetime of the returned value or of any object produced by its methods or properties, then methods and properties on those objects may produce nonsense results or throw exceptions due to the corrupted state. 因此, 如果调用方可以合理地`true`确保数据保持`skipCopies`不变, 则建议只使用参数值。Callers are therefore advised to only use a `true` value for the `skipCopies` parameter when they can be reasonably assured that the data will stay intact.

span.span: The parameter is .

exception.span: 参数不为 、空或单个 BER 编码值。

span.span: The parameter is not , empty, or a single BER-encoded value.

summary.span: 将提供的数据读取为 PKCS#8 PrivateKeyInfo，并返回内容的对象视图。

span.span: Reads the provided data as a PKCS#8 PrivateKeyInfo and returns an object view of the contents.

returns.span: 解码为 PKCS#8 PrivateKeyInfo 的内容的对象视图。

span.span: An object view of the contents decoded as a PKCS#8 PrivateKeyInfo.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法的默认行为是从`bytesConsumed` `source`发出的第一个字节的防御副本。The default behavior of this method is to make a defensive copy of the first `bytesConsumed` bytes from `source`. 当参数为`true`时, 将跳过此防御副本。 `skipCopy`When the `skipCopy` parameter is `true`, this defensive copy is skipped. 如果跳过了防御复制, 并在返回值或`bytesConsumed`其方法`source`或属性所产生的任何对象的生存期内更改了前个字节的内容, 则这些对象的方法和属性可能会生成有意义的结果或引发异常, 因为状态已损坏。If the defensive copy is skipped and the contents of the first `bytesConsumed` bytes of `source` change during the lifetime of the returned value or of any object produced by its methods or properties, then methods and properties on those objects may produce nonsense results or throw exceptions due to the corrupted state. 因此, 如果调用方可以合理地`true`确保数据保持`skipCopy`不变, 则建议只使用参数值。Callers are therefore advised to only use a `true` value for the `skipCopy` parameter when they can be reasonably assured that the data will stay intact.

exception.span: 参数的内容未成功解码为 PKCS#8 PrivateKeyInfo。

span.span: The contents of the parameter were not successfully decoded as a PKCS#8 PrivateKeyInfo.

.method public static hidebysig class System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs8PrivateKeyInfo DecryptAndDecode(valuetype System.ReadOnlySpan`1<unsigned int8> passwordBytes, valuetype System.ReadOnlyMemory`1<unsigned int8> source, [out] int32& bytesRead) cil managed

span.span: The bytes to use as a password when decrypting the key material.

param.span: 要在 ASN.1-BER 编码中读取为 PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo 结构的数据。

span.span: The data to read as a PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo structure in the ASN.1-BER encoding.

param.name: bytesRead
param.span: 此方法返回时，包含一个指示从 中读取的字节数的值。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a value that indicates the number of bytes read from .

param.span: 该参数未经初始化即被处理。

span.span: This parameter is treated as uninitialized.

summary.span: 使用提供的基于字节的密码对提供的数据进行解密，并将输出解码为 PKCS#8 PrivateKeyInfo 的对象视图。

span.span: Decrypts the provided data using the provided byte-based password and decodes the output into an object view of the PKCS#8 PrivateKeyInfo.

returns.span: 解码为 PKCS#8 PrivateKeyInfo 的已解密内容的对象视图。

span.span: An object view of the contents decrypted decoded as a PKCS#8 PrivateKeyInfo.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 密码字节直接传递到由指示`pbeParameters`的算法使用的密钥派生函数 (KDF)。The password bytes are passed directly into the Key Derivation Function (KDF) used by the algorithm indicated by `pbeParameters`. 这样, 就可以与使用 PBKDF2 (基于密码的密钥派生函数 2) 处理密码时使用 UTF-8 以外文本编码的其他系统兼容。This enables compatibility with other systems which use a text encoding other than UTF-8 when processing passwords with PBKDF2 (Password-Based Key Derivation Function 2). 此方法只支持 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo 的二进制 (BER/CER/DER) 编码。This method only supports the binary (BER/CER/DER) encoding of EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo. 如果值采用 Base64 编码或 PEM 文本格式, 则调用方必须在调用此方法之前对内容进行 Base64 编码。If the value is Base64-encoded or in the PEM text format, the caller must Base64-decode the contents before calling this method.

span.span: The password is incorrect.
-or-

exception.span: 的内容表示要应用的密钥派生功能 (KDF) 是旧的 PKCS#12 KDF，需要基于 的密码。

span.span: The contents of indicate the Key Derivation Function (KDF) to apply is the legacy PKCS#12 KDF, which requires -based passwords.
-or-

exception.span: 的内容不表示 ASN.1-BER 编码的 PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo 结构。

span.span: The contents of do not represent an ASN.1-BER-encoded PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo structure.

.method public static hidebysig class System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs8PrivateKeyInfo DecryptAndDecode(valuetype System.ReadOnlySpan`1<char> password, valuetype System.ReadOnlyMemory`1<unsigned int8> source, [out] int32& bytesRead) cil managed
Public Shared Function DecryptAndDecode (password As ReadOnlySpan(Of Char), source As ReadOnlyMemory(Of Byte), ByRef bytesRead As Integer) As Pkcs8PrivateKeyInfo

public: static System::Security::Cryptography::Pkcs::Pkcs8PrivateKeyInfo ^ DecryptAndDecode(ReadOnlySpan<char> password, ReadOnlyMemory<System::Byte> source, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] int % bytesRead);
static member DecryptAndDecode : ReadOnlySpan<char> * ReadOnlyMemory<byte> * -> System.Security.Cryptography.Pkcs.Pkcs8PrivateKeyInfo

param.name: password
param.span: 解密密钥材料时使用的密码。

span.span: The password to use when decrypting the key material.

param.name: source
param.span: ASN.1-BER 编码中 PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo 结构的字节。

span.span: The bytes of a PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo structure in the ASN.1-BER encoding.

param.name: bytesRead
param.span: 此方法返回时，包含一个指示从 中读取的字节数的值。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a value that indicates the number of bytes read from .

param.span: 该参数未经初始化即被处理。

span.span: This parameter is treated as uninitialized.

summary.span: 使用提供的基于字符的密码对提供的数据进行解密，并将输出解码为 PKCS#8 PrivateKeyInfo 的对象视图。

span.span: Decrypts the provided data using the provided character-based password and decodes the output into an object view of the PKCS#8 PrivateKeyInfo.

returns.span: 解码为 PKCS#8 PrivateKeyInfo 的已解密内容的对象视图。

span.span: An object view of the contents decrypted decoded as a PKCS#8 PrivateKeyInfo.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当的内容`source`指示使用 PBKDF1 (基于密码的密钥派生函数 1) 或 PBKDF2 (基于密码的密钥派生函数 2) 的算法时, 密码将通过 utf-8 编码转换为字节。When the contents of `source` indicate an algorithm that uses PBKDF1 (Password-Based Key Derivation Function 1) or PBKDF2 (Password-Based Key Derivation Function 2), the password is converted to bytes via the UTF-8 encoding. 此方法只支持 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo 的二进制 (BER/CER/DER) 编码。This method only supports the binary (BER/CER/DER) encoding of EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo. 如果值采用 Base64 编码或 PEM 文本格式, 则调用方必须在调用此方法之前对内容进行 Base64 编码。If the value is Base64-encoded or in the PEM text format, the caller must Base64-decode the contents before calling this method.

span.span: The bytes to use as a password when encrypting the key material.

param.name: pbeParameters
param.span: 加密密钥材料时使用的基于密码加密 (PBE) 参数。

span.span: The password-based encryption (PBE) parameters to use when encrypting the key material.

summary.span: 在使用指定的基于字节的密码和加密参数进行加密后，根据此对象的属性内容生成 PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo。

span.span: Produces a PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo from the property contents of this object after encrypting with the specified byte-based password and encryption parameters.

returns.span: 一个字节数组，其中包含 PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo 的编码形式。

span.span: A byte array containing the encoded form of the PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 密码字节直接传递到由指示`pbeParameters`的算法使用的密钥派生函数 (KDF)。The password bytes are passed directly into the Key Derivation Function (KDF) used by the algorithm indicated by `pbeParameters`. 这样, 就可以与使用 PBKDF2 (基于密码的密钥派生函数 2) 处理密码时使用 UTF-8 以外文本编码的其他系统兼容。This enables compatibility with other systems which use a text encoding other than UTF-8 when processing passwords with PBKDF2 (Password-Based Key Derivation Function 2).

exception.span: 指示应使用需要基于 密码的 。

span.span: indicates that should be used, which requires -based passwords.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当`pbeParameters`指示使用 PBKDF2 (基于密码的密钥派生函数 2) 的算法时, 通过 utf-8 编码将密码转换为字节。When `pbeParameters` indicates an algorithm that uses PBKDF2 (Password-Based Key Derivation Function 2), the password is converted to bytes via the UTF-8 encoding.

summary.span: 在使用指定的基于字节的密码和加密参数进行加密后，尝试根据此对象的属性内容生成 PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo，并将结果写入到提供的缓冲区中。

span.span: if is big enough to receive the output; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 密码字节直接传递到由指示`pbeParameters`的算法使用的密钥派生函数 (KDF)。The password bytes are passed directly into the Key Derivation Function (KDF) used by the algorithm indicated by `pbeParameters`. 这样, 就可以与使用 PBKDF2 (基于密码的密钥派生函数 2) 处理密码时使用 UTF-8 以外文本编码的其他系统兼容。This enables compatibility with other systems which use a text encoding other than UTF-8 when processing passwords with PBKDF2 (Password-Based Key Derivation Function 2).

MemberSignature.Value: public bool TryEncrypt (ReadOnlySpan<char> password, System.Security.Cryptography.PbeParameters pbeParameters, Span<byte> destination, out int bytesWritten);

public: bool TryEncrypt(ReadOnlySpan<char> password, System::Security::Cryptography::PbeParameters ^ pbeParameters, Span<System::Byte> destination, [Runtime::InteropServices::Out] int % bytesWritten);
member this.TryEncrypt : ReadOnlySpan<char> * System.Security.Cryptography.PbeParameters * Span<byte> * -> bool

param.name: password
param.span: 加密密钥材料时使用的密码。

span.span: The password to use when encrypting the key material.

param.name: pbeParameters
param.span: 加密密钥材料时使用的基于密码加密 (PBE) 参数。

span.span: The password-based encryption (PBE) parameters to use when encrypting the key material.

param.name: destination
param.span: 接收 PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo 数据的字节范围。

span.span: The byte span to receive the PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo data.

param.name: bytesWritten
param.span: 此方法返回时，包含一个指示写入 的字节数的值。

span.span: When this method returns, contains a value that indicates the number of bytes written to .

param.span: 该参数未经初始化即被处理。

span.span: This parameter is treated as uninitialized.

summary.span: 在使用指定的基于字符的密码和加密参数进行加密后，尝试根据此对象的属性内容生成 PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo，并将结果写入到提供的缓冲区中。

span.span: Attempts to produce a PKCS#8 EncryptedPrivateKeyInfo from the property contents of this object after encrypting with the specified character-based password and encryption parameters, writing the result into a provided buffer.

returns.span: 如果 具有足够的大小以接收输出，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if is big enough to receive the output; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当`pbeParameters`指示使用 PBKDF2 (基于密码的密钥派生函数 2) 的算法时, 通过 utf-8 编码将密码转换为字节。When `pbeParameters` indicates an algorithm that uses PBKDF2 (Password-Based Key Derivation Function 2), the password is converted to bytes via the UTF-8 encoding.
